data.NEWSSUB: Camex Ltd - 524440 - Resubmitting Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Financial Year Ended On March 31, 2024
data.MORE: With Ref to the above subject, we would like to inform you that we have submitted our Audited Financial Results for the Quarter and Financial Year ended on March 31, 2024 within time limit as prescribed by BSE. Further we would like to inform you that, unintentionally Segment Result page for the said period was missed in uploading the Audited Financial Results. So we are resubmitting the Audited Financial Results for the said period along with Segment page duly approved by the Board in the meeting held on dt.17-05-2024. Further, also would like to confirm you that there is no change in the Audited Financial results submitted on dt.17-05-2024 in any manner, only Segment page was missed unintentionally to upload and so entire Audited Financial result for the said period we are resubmitting along with Segment result Page. Kindly requesting you to take the same on your record.

Dear Sir/ Madam,

We would like to inform you that the Board of Directors at their meeting held today on May 17, 2024 have been taken on record audited financial results for the quarter and year ended on 31st March, 2024 and also reviewed by the Audit Committee in its respective meeting.

We are attaching herewith Audited Financial Results as approved by Board of Directors. Further attaching herewith, the Auditors Report issued by our Statutory Auditors on the Audited Financial Accounts for the quarter and year ended on 31st March, 2024 along with the declaration for unmodified audit report.

The aforesaid results are also available on Company''s website at www.continentalchemicalsltd.com.

This is for your information and records.
